message.content:
Looking at the income statement, I need to find the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is typically represented by "Depreciation" in an income statement.

Scanning through the table, I can see a line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45751.04 on 2024-01-28.

Since depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45751.04'} }
```
